alert.note: Alert for Covington; Forrest; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Lawrence; Marion; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:53PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Simpson, northeastern Marion, northwestern Forrest, northeastern Lawrence, Covington, northern Lamar, southwestern Jones and Jefferson Davis Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1153 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Union to 6 miles east of Carson to near Rawls Springs. Movement was southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Carson and Melba around 1200 AM CDT. Hattiesburg, Oma and Bunker Hill around 1215 AM CDT. Society Hill around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Hebron, Seminary, Silver Creek and Bassfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Forrest; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Lawrence; Marion; Simpson
